Text.val: 30.05.2011 SH SCR16492 Changed CLNA to calc V.OTHERADVANCESH from
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
15.11.2010 SH SCR15979 Added test on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y to skip internal limit checks
03.11.2010 SH SCR15866 Added test on CLNT212_FCI > 0 or CLNT407_FINANCECODE= S to skip internal limit checks
15.10.2010 SH SCR15866 Changed calc of v.INTERNALLIMITH based on
COFF2420_INTERNAL_LIMIT now; Added test on CLNT203_OFFICE = CLNT203_OFFICE
(individual client) for calc of investment and advances
... by default always on individual level, perhaps HOFF_INTERNALLIMITHANDLING
does not contain a proper value

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on :2 where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :3 and CMON_MONTH = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only

select ACCT_CURRENCY, cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC join :1/CLNT on :2 join :1/ACCT on ACCT_ADMNO = ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO and ACCT_CLNTNO = ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO and ACCT_DATE = ':3' where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':3' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 group by ACCT_CURRENCY order by ACCT_CURRENCY for fetch only

select CLNA_CURRENCY, cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA join :1/CLNT on :2 where CLNA_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNA_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED ='N' and CLNA_ID <> :3 and CLNA_APPROVALDATECLIMNGR <> '' group by CLNA_CURRENCY order by CLNA_CURRENCY for fetch only
